Title: Product Landing Page
Desc: Crafted a product landing page for the initial release of Stratus Pro, an Igluu 2020 release. On this project, I worked with experienced Backend Developers, UI, and UX teams. During this time, I made React components using async JavaScript, props, and state for search-boxes, login, and registration forms.

Title: Full-Stack Running App
Desc: Made a scaleable running app, allowing users to log miles and training activities, with a secure backend API with built-in JSON web tokens on Node.js that stores to a MongoDB database. App also provides powerful running insights allowing subscribers access to advanced analytics designed to enhance training regiments.
Programs: SCSS JavaScript Node.js Express.js MongoDB React.js

Title: Flask REST-API
Desc: Created a maintainable Python REST-API using Flask including API requests such as 'GET', 'POST', 'PUT', and 'DELETE'.
